nodes.text: Heist at the Temple of the Kyber

During or prior to 0 BBY, the Ithorian collector, Dok-Ondar accompanied the Weequay pirates, Hondo Ohnaka and Quadoro on a heist at the Temple of the Kyber to steal an ancient statue. After successfully stealing the statue, Ohnaka and Ondar fought off Chirrut Îmwe and managed to escape with the statue, which Ondar brought back to his antique store.
